Side Effects: Dry mouth. Blurred vision_ foggy brain_ feeling sick and cold like symptoms.
Comments: I had to stop this medication as it dried my mouth out that much it left sores all in my mouth and my tongue swoll up. Felt depressed and the foggy brain was awful. Confusion and problems with my memory as well as head aches. I wish the doctor had of explained these side effects before hand. Haven't took a tablet in 4 days and I feel loads better already and my mouth has cleared up and appetite slowly returning. If you are like me and get side affects from tables don't take these.

Side Effects: It snook up on me_ first brilliant_ then constipation of epic proportions for which I needed weekly enemas_ Blurred vision gradually worsening_ and then headaches started after 3 months.
Comments: I wish this had worked. As the side effects got worse the efficacy of the drug reduced. I had some major incontinent episodes. Constipation that stopped me wanting to eat because of nausea_ and vomiting.Blurred vision that changed my glass prescription significantly_ dry mouth - drank so much water all the time_ but the headaches which started last month are too much to bear_ so I am having Botox next week.

Side Effects: At first_ I did not experience any side effects_ and this was the only medicine that helped my OAB. This was very effective in curing my OAB which had been severe prior to me using this medication_ and other medications did not work at all. However_ over the past year_ I have started to have memory issues and word recall issues and am only 30 years old. I wasn't sure what could be causing this_ but I recently read an article that this medication can cause dementia/ memory loss.  I have stopped taking it immediately and am looking for other options. I hope the memory problems stop but am not optimistic (given what I have read). I wish I would have had this information initially as I never would have taken this.

At first I developed I have a rash across my chest and then a week later across my forehead. Not sure if it is an allergic reaction. I've never had these issues until I took this medication. Ocassional blurry vision.
Comments: Overall it works and I don't have to run to the restroom every 10 to 15 minutes. But with the rashes_ I may have to discontinue.

Side Effects: Although Vesicare did stop the bladder pain it did not stop me from running to the bathroom 15-20 times in a 24 hour period. Within 48 hours of starting this medicine I saw swelling in my knees_ legs_ thighs_ feet_ ankles_ arms_ and hands. I stopped taking it three days ago and I've noticed that my lips and face are now swollen. This is really scary!
Comments: I'm really happy for those that are having great success with Vesicare_ but for me this is a nightmare.

Side Effects: Parched mouth dry sinuses constipation itchy dry skin not sweating tired
Comments: Side effects outweighed benefit. I stopped after 5 days.

Side Effects: Just a dry mouth
Comments: Having had bladder and bowel prolapse repair surgery I was at my wits end with the need to urinate so frequently.I was waking at least 5 times a night for a wee and my life was affected during the day by the need to be near a toilet.I no longer have the urgency to wee and I have a life!

Side Effects: Although the medication helped initially_ the side effects were unbearable. Increasingly alarming blurred and double vision_ dry mouth_ dry eyes_ dry skin_ extremely chapped lips_ headaches_ memory issues_ constipation. After eye exams_ the opthalmologist expressed concerns with some shadowy places on my eyes_ as well as my complaints about recent blurry vision. I stopped taking the medication and hope that my eye issues can be resolved.
Comments: This medication produced unbearable side effects. Initially dry mouth and eyes_ constipation_ headaches_ progressed into memory issues_ unbearable dry lips and skin_ blurry and double vision. Finally_ after eye exams when the doctor expressed concern about some showy place in eyes_ I did more research and discontinued this medicine. It is horrible and should be reevaluated. Perhaps because the majority of people taking this medicine are women_ drug companies think complaints of side effects are insignificant.

Reason: Because I wanted to go to toilet frequently
Side Effects: Dry mouth. At times it worked then all of a sudden did the opposite and started again with over active bowel
Dry mouth fatigue dry eyes
Comments: I initially took 5mg but they did not stop my overactive bladder..there were no side effects with 5mg.  My gp started me on 10mg. This is my third day on 10mg and I have side effects as described above plus now my breathing seems to be affected. I dont feel good so will not be taking anymore of the 10mg. My gp will probably say to give it a bit longer but I dont think I can tolerate the adverse side effects. I will go back on 5mg because the vesicare eased the pain I had in my pelvic/bladder region.

Side Effects: Extremely nauseous_ headaches and migraines_ extreme dry mouth_ excessive thirst_ dizziness_ more tired than usual_ dry eyes_ dry sinuses_ vivid and terrifying nightmares.
Comments: I tried it thinking it was a bladder med. What could go wrong. Didn't research. BIG mistake. Am stopping this drug immediately even though it has been nice not to have to use the restroom continually. It just isn't worth the side effects. And I am terrified to go to sleep.

Side Effects: Dry mouth_ dizzy_ headache_ scratchy throat_ tired and dragging
Comments: I AM almost into this about a week no noticeable change in overactive bladder.Is it worth sticking out when I feel crappy!

Side Effects: Dry mouth so severe that I felt as though a layer of skin had been removed. Very graspy memory_ headache_ kidney ache_ bladder contraction pain_ sore dry throat_ fatigue_ dry skin_ dry eyes_ reduced perspiration. I could go on....
Comments: I would avoid this like the plague_ I would rather the inconvenience of wearing pads and the frequent toilet visits than to stay on this awful medication a day longer

Side Effects: Really none if taken with food
Comments: It is the best drug that I have tried for the pesky need to urinate suddenly and immediately. (Others were: Detrol LA_ and oxybutinine (or something like that) Both did not help at all and I could not hold my pee. Vesicare is extremely helpful and has not lost its effectiveness like the Detrol did after about a year.

Side Effects: made me feel drunk after the 3rd day
Flu like symptoms_ dry mouth_ headaches_ mental confusion_ lethargy_ dry eyes and blurred vision
Comments: I have polycystic kidney disease and kidney stones.  My urologist initially put me on 5 mg. of Vesicare to control bladder spasms and then increased it to 10 mg.  I would rather have the pain of bladder spasms than constantly feeling like I've  got the flu and mental confusion.  Over the weekend I finally looked at side effects of Vesicare.  I called my pharmacist and she said to stop taking drug immediately and call urologist first thing Monday morning.  Having surgery on Thursday.

Side Effects: Serious confusion_ also dry mouth & blurred vision. Helped some with OAB but not much
Comments: I am now taking a naturopathic remedy based on pumpkin seeds called Azo  Helps in a very mild_ gentle sort of way.  No noticeable side effects.

Side Effects: Blurry vision (3 - 5' range)_ severe dry mouth_ thinning hair_ bad taste in mouth_ dry eyes_ don't perspire_ some confusion.  Mostly worried about my vision_ which was compromised before the med...and also the confusion.  Want off this stuff.  Will tolerate it a few more weeks_ when I see specialist again.  Physiotherapy doesn't help either.
Comments: Was on Detrol first but didn't help at all.  Only one side effect of dry mouth with that med.  Then saw specialist who switched me to Vesicare.  Helps...a little.  Side effects nasty.  Worst side effect now gone....that is constipation and intense abdominal pain.  Had to tolerate that for 3 weeks_ before it went away.  Hopefully specialist has a third option I can try.  Otherwise_ I will just live with it rather than be on med.

Side Effects: Muscular weakness and cramps.  Feelings of agitation. Dizziness.  Fatigue. Blurred vision.
Comments: Whatever the positive values of Vesicare may offer_ the offsetting negative side effects more than cancel them out.  A very powerful drug that can cause more harm than good in those who are sensitive to it.  In my opinion_ it would be prudent for the FDA to reevaluate the efficacy and dangers of Vesicare_ and_ perhaps_ order another set of studies before continuing to permit its widespread distribution.

Side Effects: Dry Mouth-dizzyness-confusion-unable to think or speak clearly-eye pain-
Comments: Worst product ever-would not recommend to anyone.Stopped after nine days.

Side Effects: extreme dry mouth. blurry vision in one eye. erectile dysfunction.
Comments: This seems to be a very dangerous and toxic drug. The side effects are extensive and intensive. I would not recommend that anyone take this pharmaceutical without doing a great deal of research first.

Side Effects: I went on Vesicare because I was going to the bathroom 12-18 times a day.  It did elevate that issue.  I started stumbling over words_ grasping for thoughts & I had hair loss.  I had no idea that Vesicare was linked to memory loss until today.  I also developed pelvic floor weakness.  I will not continue to take this medicine & I plan to make a report to the FDA.
Comments: All bladder control drugs can have memory loss.  Please research any medicine your doctor prescribes to you.  I didn't realize that this could happen to me.

Reason: I was taken Vesicare for overactiv
Side Effects: I have lost all of my have in 3 months.
Mild nausea_ low mood_ blurry vision
Comments: It took a few weeks for my body to get used to this drug. I find taking it before bed is best time. Definitely helps in that I take less trips to loo during night and day. Still get leakages when sneezing / coughing sometimes. Overall_ drug has been worth taking. Currently contemplating come off for a while as nausea an issue_ what with still having to work.

Side Effects: It helped BUT I stopped taking it after coming across a researches study that Vesicare builds up in the body & can lead to major memory impairment that appears to be irreversible. Then I looked at all the foods labels I had been buying & found they were loaded with salt. Reduced my salt intake to more more than 1_000 mg per day. Frequency now under control. You can add Benbedryl to your list of drugs that build up in the body and acerbate memory loss. Big Pharma won't tell you this stuff_ & your doctor probably doesn't know about the dangers.
None and it stopped the symptoms of bladder infect I was having almost constantly.
Comments: I think it is great

Side Effects: Dry mouth_ hair thinning and loss/ memory loss?
Comments: Have been taking this for 1 yr daily.  At 62_ not certain if symptoms are as a result of the med or age.  Forgetfulness_ trouble with words.  Worse is am losing my hair rapidly and the dry mouth.  Notice also that my taste is impaired.  Have lost appetite as well provably due to taste decreased.  But no one else expressed this.  I may take it upon myself to reduce from every day to every other day.

Side Effects: Flu like_  Nassau_  confusion_ dry mouth_  tired
Comments: Worked great but had to stop due to brutal side-effects

Side Effects: Blurry vision some headaches_tingling fingers on right hand_ extremely dry and stuffy nose_dry eyes_extremely dry mouth.
Fatigue_dizzy dry mouth slight nausea

I love this product.I have my life back. I have always lost all my bladder control as soon as I have laughed. I am 50 and this has been happening since I was 14. I have had cancer and I have been through worse.  A dry mouth is helped by a teaspoon if coconut oil swirled in my mouth and spit it out before going to bed. I have my life back and I am so confident when I laugh I love my life so much.  Thank you for this. Dry mouth is only minor compared to walking around wet and leaving venues because I have leaked.
Immediate eye pain_ dry mouth and erectile dysfunction.
Comments: I cannot recommend this drugs to other males of my age.

Side Effects: I was given this as PRN for irritable bladder (damaged during gynae surgery)_ which was giving me frequency_ urgency and pain.Apparently it tones the bladder muscle and sphincter. I didn't have any problems on it per se_ but I was only using it as PRN.
Comments: Apparently new mothers are prescribed this.

Side Effects: Extreme headaches and dried out sinusse (bleeding at times)
Terrible headache_ flu like symptoms_ pain in legs_ nausea_ chest discomfort.
Recently blurred vision headaches still bladder problem (worse)

After taking a drug called oxybutynin for approx 20 years and the only side effect was dry mouth. I was told there were modern drugs out there with less side effects_ so I was offered vesicare. I've now been on it for three months and will stop taking it as the side effects are to much to bare_ dry throat and mouth constantly_ I'm now starting to get tingly feeling in my hands and heart palpitations.

Great to start with has slowed down the amount i run to the bathroom_ but crocky throught_ burning eyes_ now vision is getting blurred and worst of all confusion. I forget words_ put things down and have no memory of where i put them
Comments: it says in the info i have found 83% of people over 60 get confusion with this drug_ would have been nice to have been told this before i started to stress out i might have dementia. Now what do i do ? stop it and go through hell with my bladder or as like i am 90+ and have lost my mind.

Side Effects: None... It has worked very well for me

extreme dizziness. the medicine did work for my bladder problem but the dizziness is too hard to tolerate. I have switched to Detrol and now it's doing the same thing even worse. my doctor has no alternative except to go to a neurologist!!!  I have quit taking medicine but my question is how long is it gonna take for the side affects to go away?
Dry mouth which can be aleviated by taking BIOTENE
Comments: I am losing my hair -  could it be the Vesicare?

Side Effects: Some dry mouth.
Comments: Started out taking 5 milligrams but wasn't tolerating it well.  Cut back to 2.5 milligrams (one half tablet).  I have my life back.  I don't have to urinate every hour and I am sleeping through the night again.

Side Effects: Next to chemo- one of the worst meds I've taken! Disappointing- I had high hopes for this drug but instead of alleviating my bladder problems it produced more.I can't wait for it to leave my system_ I've never been thirstier. I feel like someone shoved a fist full of sand down my throat. Now I really appreciate the doctor giving me samples instead of the hassle & expense of the Rx. My eyes are so dry & I'm so exhausted. I actually feel like I smoked a joint w/o any of the fun benefits. I could drink a gallon of water & not quench my thirst. Why would they put this Rx on the market. I wish they would require pharm reps to try their own samples.  This Rx should be reconsidered for sale.

Severe dry mouth_ dry eyes_ violent headaches and excruciating right eye pain and photo-phobia that would last for days.  Stopped taking it on a regular basis after 6 weeks due to awful side effects. During that 6 week period I was taking the drug only 3 to 4 times a week due to the side effects. I am already on a lot of medications that dry out my mouth and they are destroying my teeth. With the addition of Vesicare my dentist is frightened I will have a mouth full of cavities and risk losing my teeth.  DRY MOUTH IS THE WORSE THING FOR CAUSING CAVITY PRODUCTION!!!! My Pharmacist told me to stop and get an ophthalmology appt. ASAP!
Comments: As a Registered nurse who is a specialist in bladder care I have never seen or experienced a drug that had such awful side effects and symptoms in my 30 year career.I quit taking the drug as i was terrified of glaucoma_vascular disease and a mouth full of cavities.  I am having to have Veneer's placed on my front teeth due dry mouth.  I had to buy prescription tooth paste and all biotene products for dry mouth.FDA needs to pull this drug until more research is done and they have done more clinical trials. It is worth being incontinent instead of risking your health and possibly your sight.  Write to the FDA to have this drug pulled off the market.  The worst thing is my urologist did know patient education.

Side Effects: After a botched hysterectomy_ I started having kidney problems. A kidney aren't was fitted. I was fine for a few weeks. Then I started to get lots of infections_ kidney_urine and thrush. After going to me doctors every week for 8 weeks. My urologist prescribed vesicare. I took it for 3 days. The side effects were horrible_ I have stopped taking them. I have 5 months before they take the stent out. This medication has so many side effects.

I first started on Detrol LA and was having severe drymouth and heart palpitations. I was then taken off those and put on vesicare. I've been on it for 3 weeks now_ side effect free. The first few days I had it_ I noticed drymouth and dry eyes again_ pretty bad but subsided after 3 days or so. No other side effects to report_ and now I pee 2 times a day instead of the usual 30. Its a tad more expensive than Detrol la_ but with no side effects after my body adjusted to the pills_ vesicare is where I'm staying. :)
Blurry vision and headaches from day 1.  Now I have a lovely rash which I'm really trying not to scratch.  Am stopping tonight and will see URO in 1 week.
Just takes a long time to pee. I feel like I am sitting on the toilet for hours.
Comments: I really like to way it works. I don't have to run to the toilet every 30 minutes. It also took away the spasms I was having in my bladder. I have IBS so I guess bladder spasms go with the IBS. I really like it when I go places like shopping_ eating out because I don't have to go as much. I used to hate that. I had to be near a bathroom no matter where I went.

Side Effects: I was given samples of this drug by my gynecologist for overactive bladder. I asked her if it would interact with my rythmal I take for heart arrythmias. She said that she didn't think so. I took one pill after I left her office. I got home and did some research and found that if you have any electrical problems in your heart and problems with QT waves_ that you should not take it. The next morning_ my pulse was 130 after I just got out of bed. I have taken two cardazam pills as my rescue pill and I am still having up and down heart rate. I would not take this drug again no matter what!!
My upper sinuses were as DRY as the Mohave Desert.  Every time I inhaled through my nose I felt a blinding electrical SHOCK-like pain behind my eyes - OUCH !
Comments: I started on Enablex and that gave me a dried out feeling in my sinuses (come to find out - a MILD dried out feeling)_ but it helped my urgent bladder.  So my doctor had me try Vesicare. OH MY GOD - OUCH. It was like electrical charges going off behind my eyes when I inhaled. I was SOOOO dried out it felt like every nerve in my upper sinuses was exposed. I couldn't standit. So I went back to Enablex - and compared to Vesicare - Enablex was easy to live with (and it worked).

Side Effects: Panic attacks the first night--felt like I had trouble breathing--Horrible fatigue--vivid nightmares--constipation dry mouth I can handle anything but the panic attacks its been 10 years since I had one.
Comments: I went into taking this very blithely--not a care in the world about side effects..I mean come on its a bladder med right??? Wow was I wrong--first horrible panic attack I've had in years and three days in a row--MAYBE there should be more warnings on the bottle--I didn't read on the web about side effects until AFTER I had them --so I didn't imageine them--would not take this medicine again.

Side Effects: stomach cramps_ dizziness_ blurred vision_ nausea_ sharp pain in bladder
Comments: I started on Vesicare after a bladder dilation to help relieve extreme and painful fullness in my bladder.  It made me very sick_ did not offer any relief for the condition.  I was switched to Sanctura and have had marked improvement.

Side Effects: Horrible headaches.  Severe eye pain.  Double vision & blurry vision_ night blindness by headlights and any lights.  BAD MEDICATION!
Comments: After months of thinking my eyes were getting bad and going to the eye dr & a sinus dr - - I finally heard a bit on a commercial about it affecting eyes & causing headaches - - I recalled the dr saying possible side effects are glaucoma_ eye pressure_ eye pain... at the time I wondered what eye pressure & eye pain could feel like... it took me a while to figure out that is what it was.  Since there are VERY LIMITED reviews/ patients on this medication there's not much info out there on it. It was a horrible medication! (It helped with slow bladder leak but didn't control sneezing/coughing bladder issues. I liked what it did help - - but I'd rather SEE & pee than take this med - LOL). I quit taking it 5 days ago & still have headaches & eye pain - the blurred vision and double vision went away within 2 days...  anyone else??????

Side Effects: swelling_ caused angio-edema (Anaphylactic reaction) which made my lips_ tongue_ and throat swell where I could not breathe. I had taken a pill before going to sleep_ and the doctors said if I had not had a phone call that woke me up_ I would have died in my sleep. I was admitted to hospital for 3 days.
Comments: I would NEVER want someone to take this med. It was given as a sample by a urologist. If I had researched the internet I would have seen (example WebMD and other sites) "Some side effects with VESICARE_ while occurring infrequently_ are potentially serious and should be reported immediately to your healthcare provider. These include but are not limited to: Severe constipation_ Worsening of glaucoma_ Difficulty passing urine_ Confusion_ Depression_ Signs of an allergic reaction_ such as unexplained rash_ hives_ itching_ wheezing_ and unexplained swelling (especially of the face/tongue/throat)_ severe dizziness_ trouble breathing." NONE of this was on the insert with the med_ or on the TV ads! I almost died from this drug!

Side Effects: Vesicare helped to cut down on trips to the bathroom. But after a couple weeks using it_ I had very bad constipation which I don't normally have. I had to stop using it so often.
Very bad nightmares each time I took it.
Comments: It really helped with overactive bladder. I take Vesicare as needed so altogether I have taken approx 25 pills over the last 6-9 months.

Side Effects: Constipation was really bad_ and some dizziness.
Comments: I would try it again because it really helped with the spasms and having to go a lot. I could go out to eat or shop and not have to go to the bathroom like I normally would - once or twice.

Side Effects: some dry mouth_ constipation_ takes a long time to pee...And I mean a long time.
Comments: I guess it's helped a little with my frequency/urgency I was going ALOT.  Now it's just kind of annoying that it takes forever to pee.  It's just really slow..and seems like I pee more each time..And like even when Im done I still have to go.
